wxstream

wxstream is a tool made by nicbudd to monitor iembot messages in a minimalistic, highly configurable frontend. It's a personal project by nicbudd intended to replace weather.im for monitoring weather events, particularly while storm chasing.

Currently the website is configured with 3 feeds. From left to right (top to bottom on mobile):

  • Default: reflects the "botstalk" channel with several types of messages filtered out (including METAR, TAF, ZFP, AFD, PIREP)
  • Severe: whitelists the default feed with only talk about severe weather and tornadoes.
  • Tornado: whitelists the default feed with only talk about tornadoes.

This is still actively being developed, expect changes and new features, including the ability to add, remove, and modify feeds.

CLICK ANYWHERE TO HIDE.
